livegrep

Fast, regular expression code search service
git clone https://source.static.kevinlin.info/external/livegrep.git
Log | Files | Refs | README | LICENSE

fileview.html (5311B) (raw) (blame)

      1 {{template "layout" .}}
      2 
      3 {{define "body"}}
      4 {{with .Data}}
      5 <section class="file-viewer">
      6   <header class="header">
      7     <nav class="header-title">
      8       {{$repo := .Repo.Name}}
      9       <a href="/view/{{$repo}}/" class="path-segment repo" title="Repository: {{$repo}}">{{$repo}}</a>:
     10       {{range $i, $e := .PathSegments}}{{if gt $i 0}}/{{end}}<a href="{{$e.Path}}" class="path-segment">{{$e.Name}}</a>{{end}}
     11     </nav>
     12     <ul class="header-actions without-selection">
     13       <li class="header-action">
     14         <a data-action-name="search" title="Perform a new search. Keyboard shortcut: /" href="#">new search [<span class='shortcut'>/</span>]</a>
     15       </li>,
     16       <li class="header-action">
     17         <a id="external-link" data-action-name="" title="View at {{.ExternalDomain}}. Keyboard shortcut: v" href="#">view at {{.ExternalDomain}} [<span class='shortcut'>v</span>]</a>
     18       </li>,
     19       {{if .Permalink}}
     20       <li class="header-action">
     21         <a id="permalink" title="Permalink. Keyboard shortcut: y" href="{{.Permalink}}">permalink [<span class='shortcut'>y</span>]</a>
     22       </li>,
     23       {{else}}
     24       <li class="header-action">
     25         <a id="back-to-head" title="return to HEAD revision" href="{{.Headlink}}">back to HEAD</a>
     26       </li>,
     27       {{end}}
     28       <li class="header-action">
     29         <a data-action-name="help" title="View the help screen. Keyboard shortcut: ?" href="#">help [<span class='shortcut'>?</span>]</a>
     30       </li>
     31     </ul>
     32     <ul class="header-actions with-selection" style="display:none">
     33       <li class="header-action">
     34         search for selected text [/]
     35       </li>,
     36       <li class="header-action">
     37         previous match [p]
     38       </li>,
     39       <li class="header-action">
     40         next match [n]
     41       </li>,
     42       <li class="header-action">
     43         <a data-action-name="help" title="View the help screen. Keyboard shortcut: ?" href="#">help [<span class='shortcut'>?</span>]</a>
     44       </li>
     45     </ul>
     46   </header>
     47 
     48   <div class="content-wrapper">
     49       {{with .DirContent}}
     50       <ul class="file-list">
     51           {{range $child := .Entries}}
     52           <li class="file-list-entry{{if $child.IsDir}} is-directory{{end}}{{if $child.SymlinkTarget}} is-symlink{{end}}">
     53             {{if $child.Path}}<a href="{{$child.Path}}">{{$child.Name}}{{if $child.IsDir}}/{{end}}</a>{{else}}{{$child.Name}}{{end}}
     54             {{if .SymlinkTarget}}&rarr; (<span class="symlink-target">{{.SymlinkTarget}}</span>){{end}}
     55           </li>
     56           {{end}}
     57       </ul>
     58       {{end}}
     59       {{with .FileContent}}
     60       <div class="file-content">
     61         <code id="source-code" class="code-pane language-{{.Language}}">{{.Content}}</code>
     62         <!--
     63         NOTE: The reason the line number links are after the code block above is because
     64         they take a significant amount of time to render for large files. If we keep
     65         them before the code block, we'll block the rendering of the important content until
     66         the line numbers are done. Placing them after the code block and absolutely positioning them
     67         to be rendered before seems to work well though.
     68         -->
     69         <div id="line-numbers" class="line-numbers hide-links" style="display:none">
     70           {{range $index, $element := loop .LineCount}}
     71             {{$lineNum := toLineNum $index}}
     72             <a id="L{{$lineNum}}" href="#L{{$lineNum}}">{{$lineNum}}</a>
     73           {{end}}
     74         </div>
     75       </div>
     76       {{end}}
     77   </div>
     78 
     79   <section class="help-screen u-modal-overlay hidden">
     80     <div class="help-screen-card u-modal-content">
     81       <ul>
     82         <li>Click on a line number to highlight it</li>
     83         <li>Shift + click a second line number to highlight a range</li>
     84         <li>Press <kbd class="keyboard-shortcut">/</kbd> to start a new search</li>
     85         <li>Press <kbd class="keyboard-shortcut">b</kbd> to see which authors wrote which lines</li>
     86         <li>Press <kbd class="keyboard-shortcut">l</kbd> to see the commit log for this file</li>
     87         <li>Press <kbd class="keyboard-shortcut">v</kbd> to view this file/directory at {{.ExternalDomain}}</li>
     88         <li>Press <kbd class="keyboard-shortcut">y</kbd> to create a permalink to this version of this file</li>
     89         <li>Select some text and press <kbd class="keyboard-shortcut">/</kbd> to search for that text</li>
     90         <li>Select some text and press <kbd class="keyboard-shortcut">enter</kbd> to search for that text in a new tab</li>
     91         <li>Select some text and press <kbd class="keyboard-shortcut">p</kbd> for the previous match for that text</li>
     92         <li>Select some text and press <kbd class="keyboard-shortcut">n</kbd> for the next match for that text</li>
     93       </ul>
     94     </div>
     95   </section>
     96 </section>
     97 {{end}}
     98 
     99 <script{{.Nonce}} src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/prism/1.14.0/prism.min.js" integrity="sha384-55dGHwJ+p8K+4zJGgJR7q7Fl9FuG++oKmlhKuS+dWjEMj6rBCp7AFYw55b0E5/K8" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    100 <script{{.Nonce}} src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/prism/1.14.0/plugins/autoloader/prism-autoloader.min.js" integrity="sha384-S+UYfywCk42UjE2CVTgW2zT3c/X5Uw25LTU93Pn5HmyD5D31yHRu6I5VadHu3Qf5" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    101 <script{{.Nonce}}>
    102   Prism.plugins.autoloader.languages_path =
    103   'https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/prism/1.14.0/components/';
    104 </script>
    105 {{end}}
